data.title: Companized A/S
data.meta_description: FSC速-certified cardboard for packaging and storage
data.text:
We help you identify your need for packaging to find out if cardboard or paper is the best solution. Then we find the shape that suits your product the best. Cardboard can be the end product, the storage, as well as the material is perfect for transporting the end product. We can make sure that your logo is printed on the shipping packaging, so you can reuse the packaging for further shipping. We help you with the design and ensure the best possible quality in print.

FSC速-certification

Responsibility is about a lot more than recycling. It is about giving something back to nature. On that behalf we are happy to have received the FSC速 certificate which gives us the right to label our products with the FSC速-logo.
